## DropCursorExtension class

Create a plugin that, when added to a ProseMirror instance, causes a decoration to show up at the drop position when something is dragged over the editor.


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DropCursorExtension extends Extension<DropCursorExtensionOptions> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultOptions](./core-extensions.dropcursorextension.defaultoptions.md) |  | <code>DropCursorExtensionOptions</code> |  |
|  [name](./core-extensions.dropcursorextension.name.md) |  | <code>&quot;dropCursor&quot;</code> |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [plugin()](./core-extensions.dropcursorextension.plugin.md) |  | Use the dropCursor plugin with provided options. |
